scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf pnpm-lock.yaml && rm -rf apps/web/node_modules && rm -rf apps/my-expo-app/node_modules && pnpm install
scripts.dev-with-fastapi: concurrently "next dev" "uv sync -p python3.11 && source .venv/bin/activate && python3 -m hypercorn api.index:app --reload -b 0.0.0.0:8000"
scripts.fastapi-dev: uv sync -p python3.11 && source .venv/bin/activate && python3 -m hypercorn api.index:app --reload -b 0.0.0.0:8000
scripts.eas-build-local: cd apps/my-expo-app && eas build --profile local --local --platform ios
scripts.eas-build-dev: cd apps/my-expo-app && eas build --profile development --platform ios --non-interactive
scripts.eas-build-prod: cd apps/my-expo-app && eas build --profile production --platform ios
